name: Amazing Bumpman
overview: Amazing Bumpman is an Action game, developed by VSS and published by Telegames, Inc., which was released in 1984. You help the Amazing Bumpman travel around the grid attempting to move the white numbers onto their proper places in the center of the grid. The game never shipped with official box art nor a box for that matter. Was Only shipped with the cartridge and paper manual. Fan cover art by Chris Coles
